alert.note: Alert for Wayne (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 07 at 8:24PM EDT until July 07 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR EAST CENTRAL WAYNE COUNTY... At 824 PM EDT, emergency management reported flash flooding in New Hope at 722 pm, resulting in a motorist needed to be rescued due to high water. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain has fallen. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Goldsboro and Elroy. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
